legend.name: The Sunken City of Aruvalis
legend.origin: The empire of Aruvalis thrived thousands of years ago, its people worshiping the sea goddess Thalora.
legend.myth: It is said that the city was swallowed by the ocean after its rulers defied the goddess, building a temple of greed rather than faith.

rumors.rumor: Some sailors claim to have seen golden spires beneath the waves during full moons.
It is believed that Aruvalis' last ruler, Queen Lysara, still lives beneath the sea as a cursed spirit.
A secret society may be searching for the city, hoping to reclaim its ancient magic.
